text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Invasive Mechanical Ventilation

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    243161004 Positive end expiratory pressure increased (procedure)
    243162006 Positive end expiratory pressure increased to optimal positive end expiratory pressure (procedure)
    243163001 Positive end expiratory pressure increased to best positive end expiratory pressure (procedure)
    243164007 Positive end expiratory pressure reduced (procedure)
    243166009 Positive end expiratory pressure reduced to optimal positive end expiratory pressure (procedure)
    243167000 Positive end expiratory pressure reduced to best positive end expiratory pressure reduced to best (procedure)
    243169002 Zero end expiratory pressure maintained (procedure)
    26763009 Controlled ventilation procedure and therapy, initiation and management (procedure)
    286812008 Pressure controlled ventilation (procedure)
    286813003 Pressure controlled synchronized intermittent mandatory ventilation (procedure)
    405609003 Volume controlled ventilation (procedure)
    45851008 Positive end expiratory pressure ventilation therapy, initiation and management (procedure)
    4764004 Jet ventilation procedure (procedure)
    66852000 Flow and timed ventilation procedure, initiation and management (procedure)
    8948006 Assisted ventilation therapy, pressure or volume preset, initiation and management (procedure)

name: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Invasive Mechanical Ventilation
